title: Long-run impact of spending on capital goods

content.question: An increase in spending on capital goods will most likely lead to which of the following in the long run?

choices.label: An increase in long-run aggregate supply
An increase in consumption spending due to crowding out

content.answer: An increase in long-run aggregate supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
